Several members of the [[Fatui]] appear within the game as enemies that players can fight; [[Fatui Skirmishers]], [[Fatui Cicin Mages]], [[Fatui Pyro Agent]]s, and [[Mirror Maiden]]s. Each type of '''Fatui''' enemy is listed below.

Like any [[Other Human Factions]], the Fatui have -20% resistance against [[Damage Bonus/Physical|Physical Damage]].
